name: Nulvest
description:
Nulvest is a turn-based RPG in the style of games like Final Fantasy & Octopath Traveler.  It is currently in a playable demo state. Currently the 1st dungeon and boss are complete.

Journey through the town of Nulvest and the nearby adventuring academy in this long form JRPG. Play as Yui Nakano a student in her 1st year at Nulvest Adventuring academy. Join her and her friends through fierce combat and strategical choice as you discover the mystery that is taking over the academy.

Nulvest was created with RPG Maker MZ and the Visu-Stella plugins.

All feedback is appreciated as where to take this next!
